original_title: Proezas de Satanás na Vila de Leva-e-Traz
overview: In the village of Leva-e-Traz, the discovery of a oil field is responsible for a mass evasion of the townspeople. Left are the old and incapable for the extraction job. When the local priest announces he, too, is leaving the town, Satan emerge thrilled with the chance of overtaking the place.
title: Proezas de Satanás na Vila de Leva-e-Traz
